title: XP Boost?
body: On my profile it shows I have an experience boost active. I did not buy one at all. I played one game but could not tell if it was actually used on it or not. Like it says i have 9 wins left but when I won the match i could not tell how much extra it added.

replies.body: IP boosts on accounts converted to XP, since IP is no longer being rewarded after a match.  You should see it by mousing over where IP rewards used to show up in the post game screen.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rZ2H3Xr5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-08T19:16:57.693+0000)
>
> IP boosts on accounts converted to XP, since IP is no longer being rewarded after a match.  You should see it by mousing over where IP rewards used to show up in the post game screen.

I also somehow have an XP boost but I did not purchase any IP boost. I just noticed and now it says that I have 7 wins left. My friend did not get one but I have one somehow. Even looking in my purchase history, I didn't buy any.

Edit: Not complaining or anything :) cuz I'm happy, but just wondering how I got it

> [{quoted}](name=Choco Buns,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rZ2H3Xr5,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-08T20:31:05.166+0000)
>
> I also somehow have an XP boost but I did not purchase any IP boost. I just noticed and now it says that I have 7 wins left. My friend did not get one but I have one somehow. Even looking in my purchase history, I didn't buy any.
> 
> Edit: Not complaining or anything :) cuz I'm happy, but just wondering how I got it

I didn't purchase an ip boost either lol. Oh well. :3 xD
I have this happening to me as well, was hoping someone would answer your question lol. It's a ten win xp boost. :o

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rZ2H3Xr5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-08T19:16:57.693+0000)
>
> IP boosts on accounts converted to XP, since IP is no longer being rewarded after a match.  You should see it by mousing over where IP rewards used to show up in the post game screen.

After 7.22 my IP boosts not converted. Xp count now is 0. Need help!
